name: Don't Say A Slur! A survival horror experience
name_original: Don't Say A Slur! A survival horror experience
description:
It's hard not to say slurs. This game is a manifestation of my day to day STRUGGLE not saying offensive slurs and being held accountable for my actions.

While only 30 seconds long, this is harder than any soulsborne you have ever played.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrows to move

S to say a slur (Don't say a slur!)
